--- title: "Epiverse-TRACE Ecosystem Contributions" subtitle: "Analysis of contributions to the broader R ecosystem during the Wellcome Epiverse-TRACE Phase 1 grant" format: html: theme: cosmo toc: true toc-depth: 3 code-fold: true code-summary: "Show code" fig-width: 10 fig-height: 6 self-contained: true embed-resources: true execute: warning: false message: false echo: false freeze: true editor: visual --- ::: {.callout-note icon="false"} ## Key Findings **259 contributions** across **50 repositories** in the broader R ecosystem **78%** of contributions were to critical ecosystem infrastructure: Core R libraries (r-lib), ROpenSci, and the Carpentries **14 team members** contributed to the wider ecosystem at least once **Top 3 contributors** (from data.org, LSHTM, and MRCG) accounted for **85%** of all contributions ::: ## Contribution Overview ### Total Contributions by Ecosystem Component ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### Repository Impact: Stars vs Contributions ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ## Institutional Analysis ### Contributions by Organization ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
